name: You are not alone, either if you like it or not!
name_original: You are not alone, either if you like it or not!
description:
This is a submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.

You play as a man who hates his life so he must make other people's lifes miserable as well.

NOTE: this game was supposed to be played in browser but Unity decided to screw me in the last moment so I had to make it downloadable.
